about_the_game:
Project Viper

Discover strategic capabilities in Project Viper, an innovative blend of strategy and action set in a futuristic world on the verge of collapse.

Seize Opportunities

Exploit your enemies with various tools designed to do just that. Find your enemy's weakness and use it to your advantage. Different equipment can synergize, so choose your loadout carefully.

Explore, Explore, Explore

Gather items from numerous areas, craft powerful weapons, and discover secrets waiting to be known. Brew potions for temporary boosts or cook carrot cake to savor; it's your job to find ways to grow powerful, even if it's just for a moment.

Exploit Your Enemies

The enemies you fight determine your phase of the game. Will you slay the weak or tower over the impossible? It lies in the equipment you use and how you use it.

Inventory Management

Your inventory is the artery to your power. Your capacity is limited, so choosing what to keep and what to lose is vital. Every item you get could prove helpful to you.

In Project Viper, success hinges on strategic thinking and resource management. With each climb, you'll grow closer to finding what you have become.

Are you ready to take on the adventure? Or will you crumble into the depths below and discover who you are...?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or similar
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent)
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU (Optional) for smooth rendering of animations or graphics-intensive content, but integrated graphics should also work fine.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
